title: Ep83 Horse Crimes
description: This week, the gals saddle up to explore some equine crimes. Topics include a professional horse hitman, some suspicious meat filler, and literal painted pony. Pour a glass of Hot To Trot Red Blend from 14 Hands Winery, grab a bucket, reconsider that frozen burger patty, and tune in for Horse Crimes.   This ep is supported by TalkSpace. Get $45 off your 1st month at www.talkspace.com/gals
